data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Whenever he has time off of work, Joe likes to visit the zoo. He ____ looking ____ the ____ animals, and ____ likes ____ spend ____ whole ____ there. His ____ animal ____ the ____. He thinks they are just wonderful.
data.partBlankContent: Whenever he has time off of work, Joe likes to visit the zoo. He lo___ looking a_ the for____ animals, and h_ likes t_ spend t__ whole d__ there. His favo____ animal i_ the elep____. He thinks they are just wonderful.
data.fullContent: Whenever he has time off of work, Joe likes to visit the zoo. He loves looking at the foreign animals, and he likes to spend the whole day there. His favorite animal is the elephant. He thinks they are just wonderful.
data.answer: 每当他有不工作的时间，乔喜欢参观动物园。他喜欢看外来的动物，他喜欢在那里呆上一整天。他最喜欢的动物是大象。他觉得他们太棒了。
